name: Getting Here
meta_title: Getting to Keswick Hall | Luxury Resort in Charlottesville
meta_description: Centrally located in Charlottesville VA, learn more about location and area that Keswick Hall is located. Hotel in the Blue Ridge Mountains, Virginia. Book today.
short_description: Keswick Hall is ideally situated a short two and a half hour drive from Washington, D.C. – and, at the foothills of the stunning Blue Ridge Mountains.
